attributes.action: Ban the sale at all childrens soft play centres
attributes.additional_details:
To have a license an establishment should be responsible for the following:
•Public safety
•Protection of children from harm
•The prevention of public nuisance 

In my case these men were not asked to leave by the eatablishment and continued to be a threat to us and others around them.
attributes.background: A soft play area is where children should be safe to play and have fun without threatening or violent behaviour. Today we were verbally abused and threatened by two men who were drinking along with a few other adults treating the establishment as a pub.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
	
We're not sure exactly what you'd like to be banned from sale at soft play centres. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
